title: Make Tahm Kench great again.
body: Listen Riot. How dare you make such an amazing champion with the best backstory in the game, to die for voice acting and possibly the best dance action ever and then make him mostly useless.  Please fix this champion! I'm not asking you to make him S+ or anything but why did you have to gut him? He is a D rank champion these days. Please please fix this champion!

replies.body: They should just remove his ability to eat allies and revert some of the nerfs. Problem (mostly) solved.
Every time they make Tahm good, the fish causes issues for EVERYONE. His ability to just nullify someone's ability to target key carries with no means around it is just too problematic.
We should make hats that say MTGA(Make Tahm Great Again).
Pro play. They killed tahm for pro play. Rip I love his voice acting as well

That was the first step. Then, for several patches, Tahm Kench dominated in top lane in solo queue, but only in short games. He was toxic as an enemy and as an ally because he would win his lane without difficulty and then fall off harder than a Lee Sin in a 45-minute match.

He cannot have more utility than a standard support or he dominates in competitive play. He cannot have more damage or crowd control than a standard tank or he dominates solo queue.

He was an abomination and the gutter is where he belongs until Riot can give him a proper VGU.
